mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM') as DAY, SUM(A.PRICE_PAY) as PRICE FROM T_ORDER A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PAY_STATUS = 2 AND TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY') = #{year} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY DAY ASC
SELECT TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY') as DAY, SUM(A.PRICE_PAY) as PRICE FROM T_ORDER A WHERE 1=1 and A.PAY_STATUS = 2 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY') ORDER BY DAY ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAY, SUM(A.PRICE_PAY) as PRICE FROM T_ORDER A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PAY_STATUS = 2 AND TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{month} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(A.INDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY DAY ASC
